Ben Leskey's Blog: academics academics posts from Ben Leskey https://benleskey.com/blog/tags/academics en-us 2023 Ben Leskey Thu, 16 Mar 2023 18:20:43 +0000 Thu, 16 Mar 2023 18:20:43 +0000
I took the ETS major field test for computer science Every senior student at MVNU takes a standardized assessment. The assessment lets MVNU administration compare how well their students are doing against other institutions, and how well each program is teaching the fundamentals of the program’s field. In my case the assessment was the ETS major field test for computer science. While I knew the test was coming up, I wasn’t given any information about what would be on the test, and since I knew it wouldn’t affect my graduation or GPA I wasn’t particularly concerned about studying for it. The day before the testing day I decided to look… deepdivesoftwareacademics https://benleskey.com/blog/cs_mft https://benleskey.com/blog/cs_mft Thu, 16 Mar 2023 12:00:00 +0000 _
